introduction: Overflowing inbox? Inbox Zero can organize it in 30 seconds! - no matter the size. Clear your annoying emails and get to Inbox Zero. Zero AI can do that.
features: Complete control over account and data
targetPeople: Individuals and businesses with overflowing email inboxes

faqs.question: How quickly can Inbox Zero organize my inbox?
faqs.answer: Inbox Zero can organize your inbox in 30 seconds.

faqs.question: Can I unsubscribe from emails using Inbox Zero?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can unsubscribe seamlessly with the press of a button.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with Inbox Zero?
faqs.answer: Yes, Inbox Zero uses end to end encryption and is a Google Security Partner.

faqs.question: Do I have control over my account and data?
faqs.answer: Yes, Inbox Zero gives you complete control over your account and data.

faqs.question: Is Inbox Zero suitable for businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes, Inbox Zero is designed to improve email productivity for businesses.
